scripts.dev: concurrently -n dashboard,worker -c magenta,cyan "pnpm -C packages/worker/dashboard dev" "pnpm -C packages/worker dev"
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm -C packages/worker exec wrangler -c ../../wrangler.toml d1 migrations apply DB --local
scripts.db:seed: pnpm -C packages/worker exec wrangler -c ../../wrangler.toml d1 execute DB --local --file ./seed.sql
